snippet: Jonathan Brand, an artist, once restored a 1969 Ford Mustang. He has now recreated the car as a full-size paper sculpture, which is being shown at the Aldrich Contemporary Art Museum in Ridgefield, Conn.
abstract: Artist Jonathan Brand has created a full-size paper sculpture of a 1969 Ford Mustang, a car he once restored; sculpture, titled One Piece at a Time, is on view at the Aldrich Contemporary Art Museum in Ridgefield, Conn.
lead_paragraph: Jonathan Brand, an artist, once restored a 1969 Ford Mustang. He has now recreated the car as a full-size paper sculpture, which is being shown at the Aldrich Contemporary Art Museum in Ridgefield, Conn.

headline.seo: Nothing but a Paper Trail for a Mustang Long Gone
headline.main: Nothing but a Paper Trail for a Mustang Long Gone
headline.print_headline: Nothing but a Paper Trail For a Mustang Long Gone
